short_summary: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) requires mobile shredding services for materials at multiple Service Canada/Passport Program regional offices across Canada
description: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) requires mobile shredding services for materials at multiple Service Canada/Passport Program regional offices across Canada. IRCC deals with highly sensitive and private information for the processing of passports and other operational needs. Due to the diverse and sensitive nature of the documents to be shredded, this request for proposal requires that a contractor provides scheduled and un-scheduled on-site shredding to the Service Canada/Passport Program regional offices.
full_summary:
Mobile Shredding Services Contract
=====================================

**Contract Title:**Mobile Shredding Services for Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada
**Reference Number**: cb-797-34549797
**Solicitation Number**: CIC-157284
**Tender Closing Date**: June 13, 2024, at 14:00:00 hours
**Expected Contract Start Date**: June 21, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Background**: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) requires mobile shredding services for sensitive and private information at multiple Service Canada/Passport Program regional offices across Canada.

**Scope of Work**: The successful contractor is expected to provide scheduled and unscheduled on-site shredding services to the Service Canada/Passport Program regional offices. The contract period is for 1 year with options to renew for 4 additional one-year periods.

**Trade Agreements**: The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this tender.

**Regions of Opportunity**: The contract will be executed in the region of Canada, with options to expand to other regions.

**Contracting Authority**: The contracting authority is Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC), represented by the Service Canada and Passport Program.

**Contact Information**:

* Name: Glauco Santos
* Email: [IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca](mailto:IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 664-7501
* Address: 715 Peel Street, Montreal, Quebec, Canada K1A 1L1

**Tender Documents**: The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and supporting information, can be accessed through the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/>

**Closing Instructions**: Bids must be submitted electronically to the above link. The closing date for bids is June 13, 2024. Please note that late bids will not be accepted. Thank you for your interest in this tender opportunity. [1]
